validation_notes.dates: Extractable dates: project_start_date (2022-01-01), crediting_period_start (2022-01-01), sampling_date (2023-02-06). Some dates like submission_date and imagery_date are either not in documents or in formats not reliably extracted.
validation_notes.land_tenure: Nick Denman owns 100% of the Project Area. Name appears as 'Nick Denman' in Project Plan Section 1.7. Total Project Area is 82.08 hectares (from Baseline Report Page 2).
validation_notes.project_ids: Official Regen Network ID is C06-006 (appears in Registry Agent Review documents). Internal IDs (4997Botany22, 4998Botany23) are intentionally filtered out as 'filename prefixes' by the extraction system.
